Class RequestDataHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.quicar.RequestDataHelper

  • public class RequestDataHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class extend DatabaseHelper and mainly handle requests data

      • queryUserRequest

        void queryUserRequest(java.lang.String userName,
                      java.lang.String mode,
                      OnGetRequestDataListener listener)
        This method will check if the request is opened and return request data to listener
        Parameters:
        userName - user name of query
        mode - mode of the user
        listener - listener for notification and obtain return value

      • setRequestActive

        void setRequestActive(java.lang.String requestID,
                      User driver,
                      java.lang.Float offeredPrice,
                      OnGetRequestDataListener listener)
        This method will check if there is an inactive request belongs to the rider and set the request to active, then call the updateRequest method
        Parameters:
        requestID - id of the request
        driver - driver of the request to be set
        listener - listener for notification

      • setRequestPickedUp

        public void setRequestPickedUp(java.lang.String requestID,
                               OnGetRequestDataListener listener)
        This method will check if there is an active and not picked up request belongs to the rider and set the request to picked up, then call the updateRequest method
        Parameters:
        requestID - id of the request
        listener - listener for notification

      • setRequestArrived

        public void setRequestArrived(java.lang.String requestID,
                              OnGetRequestDataListener listener)
        This method will check if there is an active and picked up but has not arrived reuqest that belongs to the rider and set the request to has arrived, then call the updateRequest method
        Parameters:
        requestID - id of the request
        listener - listener for notification

      • cancelRequest

        public void cancelRequest(java.lang.String requestID,
                          OnGetRequestDataListener listener)
        This method will check if an inactive request exists and call the delRequest method
        Parameters:
        requestID - rider name of query
        listener - listener for notification

      • completeRequest

        public void completeRequest(java.lang.String requestID,
                            java.lang.Float payment,
                            java.lang.Float rating,
                            OnGetRequestDataListener listener)
        This method will check if an active request exists and call delRequest method follow by addRecord method
        Parameters:
        requestID - id of the request
        payment - payment of the request
        rating - rating of the request
        listener - listener for notification
